info.name: Dark XIVPads
info.description: I originally made this for personal use, so it was meant for Chrome. It will probably look bad in other browsers. I'm lazy, but if anyone asks I'll probably fix it for other browsers... Note that this is still a WIP since the only pages I use are the front page and my personal character page.
info.additionalInfo:
v1. Spent hours making this stupid thing, might as well share it...
v1.2 Edited the "Search" and "Ranking" pages.. at least it's readable. Needs fixing.
